name: SLICE 'N' DICE (Wanderer Studio)
description:
In the Last Age, in the Last Battle, 

You will end and destroy all randomness in this world, 

with the most powerful random thing itself:

  "the Sword of Randomness". 

You are: The Cursed Sword Dice.

How to play:

  • Use your mouse to navigate the dice. Click Left Mouse Button to dash toward the cursor and slice the enemy.
  • All the damage and enemy health follow the random rules of dice. Enjoy the chaotic of randomness and have fun.
